pullrequest.title: undo redo added to edit menu and re arranged it

content.raw: I worry that those options are visually so far removed from the Edit menu label that folks might not make the connection that it's Edit--> Model. Just seeing "Model" as an option could be confusing. Since The Building Editor and Model Editor are separate modes within Gazebo, I think it's important to be descriptive and indicate to the user that they're going to open a special mode.
